body:
##1. 1Gate-Robo
### Defensive
**1. StarGate-Robo-Expand**
	
Keep your expansion safe by keeping them at their base with the phoenix.
If they went went for collo, poke them as they start pushing out or whenever you can. If they push out with immortals, stop probe production and keep tabs with their army with phoenix. Lift immortals immediately at the beginning of the engagement.

### Offensive

_WIP_
---

##2. 3-gate blink stalkers

### Defensive
**1. 3 Stalker opening to robo expand **

    9	scout,
    10	CB Nexus  		# after first pylon
    13	Gate 			# won't leave you with enough mins
    					# for the 14'th probe. It's OK.
    14	Assimilator
	    CB Nexus 
	15 	Core
	16	Pylon
	
	When Core is 75% done
		Build Gate-2
	
	When Gateway-1 is done	
		Train Stalker-1, CB once
			Stalker-1 will:
				1. Scout your natural for proxies
				2. Scout 3rd base for proxies
				3. Head to farthest watchtower
				4. Snipe probes as they go out.
	
	Get 2nd Assimilator
	
	When Stalker-1 is done
		Train Stalker-2, CB once
				
	When Gateway-2 is done
		Train Stalker-3 from there, CB once
		Send a probe to watchtower where Stalker-1 is 
			1. So you still hold tower when Stalker kills
			probes moving out		
			2. If 9-scout probe survived, use her instead
				
	When 3rd Stalker is out
		Build Robo
		Build Gateway-3
		Expand
	
	Spend all chronos on immortals, keep probing
	
	Split army at the bottom and one on the top
		Each in its own control group
		Each with its own Immortal
		
	Chrono an obs out when you have 2 immortals, rally 
	it to enemy base.
		This obs will :
		1. scout for expo
		2. scout for tech

### Offensive

_WIP_
name: Reactive Protoss vs Protoss
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
